about_the_game:
Fight other players in a fast paced environment with gravity that behaves differently across various maps.

Get the weapon you like the most and dominate the lobby with your skills! Kick, grab and shoot other players in to their doom.

Different maps, with a big variety in between, will allow you to express your ability against in unique ways.

A lot of customization to the gameplay for every lobby will allow you to explore many experiences along with different game modes! FFA, TEAM DEATHMATCH, CAPTURE THE FLAG and more that will come.

Check out also player's made maps! With the map editor you can create with little effort great content to play with others.

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain blood, guns, explosions and general violence (kicking).

detailed_description:
Fight other players in a fast paced environment with gravity that behaves differently across various maps.

Get the weapon you like the most and dominate the lobby with your skills! Kick, grab and shoot other players in to their doom.

Different maps, with a big variety in between, will allow you to express your ability against in unique ways.

A lot of customization to the gameplay for every lobby will allow you to explore many experiences along with different game modes! FFA, TEAM DEATHMATCH, CAPTURE THE FLAG and more that will come.

Check out also player's made maps! With the map editor you can create with little effort great content to play with others.
name: ComingAllOver

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 4 hardware CPU threads - Intel® Core™ i5 750 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Fight other players in this fast-paced arena! Grapple across dynamic maps with shifting gravitational forces, blasting foes into black holes or the cold void of space. Master a diverse arsenal and dominate the competition with skill and cunning.
